intro: Pleurospermum likiangense, commonly known as the Yunnan pleurospermum, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Asteraceae and is characterized by its hairy stems and yellow to orange flowers. The plant typically grows in mountainous regions and is adapted to cooler climates. It has lance-shaped leaves and produces small, daisy-like blooms. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and endemic species.
